subHeading: Instant temporary email for secure, spam-free sign-ups.
emailCopiedToastDescription: The email address has been copied to your clipboard.
copyFailedToastDescription: Could not copy email to clipboard.
emailContentNotSelected: Select an email to view its content.
poweredByPassion: Powered by passion. Sustained by your love❤️
testimonialsSubheading: Discover why people love using our temporary email service for privacy and convenience.
testimonial1Content: This service is perfect for quick sign-ups. The 10-minute timer is just enough for my needs.
testimonial2Content: I use this all the time to avoid spam. Simple to use, and it gets the job done every time.
testimonial3Content: Great for one-off uses. It’s fast, effective, and keeps my main inbox clean without hassle.
welcomeEmailContent: This is welcome email number {{number}} to your temporary address: {{emailAddress}}. Enjoy your private inbox!
newEmailContent: You've got a new message at {{emailAddress}}. Check it out!
inboxInitializingDescription: We're setting up your temporary mailbox. This should only take a moment.
inboxEmptyDescription: No emails yet for {{email}}. New messages will appear here automatically.
inboxLoadingDescription: Checking for new messages for {{email}}. Hang tight!
adPlaceholderDescription: This space is reserved for an ad. Imagine something eye-catching here!
